response.overview: "What if you had it all ... and then the FBI took it all away? Yeah...the Kirby’s are having that kind of a day. Ex-Pop Star/Dancer, Melissa Kirby, eagerly traded in her fishnets and glitter for a Billionaire Tycoon husband and new title of stepmom. But she’ll have to rely on her old talents and friends if she wants to keep her new life and family together. They lied when they say it’s the family you choose ... it’s the family you’re stuck with."
response.title: Stuck Together
